column4: hello people! could someone list me some optional desktop environments for Ubuntu that would be very lightweight, and with a nice mouse-2nd-button-menu-navigation thing instead of two panels on the desktop, as there are in Gnome.
One-line upgrade: sudo sed -e 's/warty/hoary/' -i /etc/apt/sources.list && sudo aptitude update && sudo aptitude dist-upgrade
ehm, then you have not completely upgraded :)
do you have ubuntu-desktop or kubuntu-desktop installed?
hmm, it should be updated then...
let vlc use esd or disable esd
how did you do that smiley?
